GeneralInformation.Principal: MDM RABIATHUL BAZRIYA D/O ABU BAKAR
GeneralInformation.School Vision: A vibrant school which inspires passion in learning and commitment towards excellence.
GeneralInformation.School Mission: To nurture thinking individuals who are confident and self-directed learners with shared values and are active contributors to society.
GeneralInformation.School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: The school's vision is to be a vibrant school which inspires passion in learning and commitment towards excellence. We seek to achieve our vision through our mission of nurturing thinking individuals who are confident and self-directed learners with shared values and are active contributors to society. Our shared values are represented by the acronym, IDEAS, which stands for:  Integrity our Core Dare to Innovate Excellence our Quest Ardent Pursuit of Learning Synergy for Success  Our school's motto is "Joy in Learning and Pure in Act". Guided by our school vision, mission, shared values and motto, we believe that every child matters. We see the importance of nurturing our pupils to be passionate in learning, providing them with authentic learning experiences and developing in them the 21st century competencies through providing a holistic education.   We also have built a very rich culture in aesthetics. We believe strongly in building the confidence and self-esteem of the pupils through the arts; language arts, performing arts and visual arts which will create platforms for them to express themselves creatively and articulate their thoughts with clarity.  We will continue to provide a varied and enriching differentiated curriculum for the pupils in both the academic and non-academic areas to stretch them intellectually, aesthetically and physically.  Appropriate school-based strategies are used in the classroom to engage the pupils actively so that they find joy, purpose and passion in their learning.  Questioning techniques and explicit thinking strategies are intentionally used during lessons so that pupils will develop an Innovation mindset.  The school places premium importance in building the character and values of our pupils so that they are developed well in the social and moral domains. Opportunities will be provided for every pupil to learn and exemplify the values taught so that our pupils will develop into cultured and gracious individuals.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: GOVERNMENT SCHOOL / CO-ED SCHOOL / SINGLE SESSION

School Distinctive Programmes.Music & Performing Arts: Learning Through the Arts & Learning In the Arts

SpecialProgrammes.Special Student Development Programmes O: We strongly believe that performing arts is an effective approach to the holistic development of our pupils and a key contributor to character development. Our Learning for Life Programme (LLP), Learning Through The Arts & Learning in the Arts, provides every one of our pupils with authentic learning experiences and develop their 21st century competencies, in particularly the development of socio-emotional competencies that include building of self-esteem, confidence and our school's shared values.    Through our LLP, all pupils will learn harmonica from Primary 3. Throughout their 6 years in Evergreen Primary, they will be exposed to different performing art forms like Chinese Drumming, Ukulele and Digital Music Composition and Garage Band.  Various Co-Curricular Activities in the school also aim to provide opportunities for pupils to build their character and resilience. Our Modular PE programme provides a range of movement experiences with the purpose to help all pupils to develop a foundation to an active and positive life.  To enable our pupils to be a future global citizens, our pupils embarked on Overseas Learning Journeys to learn about other cultures and interact with peers from neighboring countries. They also learn to be gracious hosts when the school hosts teachers and students from other countries.  Through cultural literacy we hope to inculcate the values of empathy and respect amongst our pupils.
